title: Compare: Run selector UI
description: Create the UI for selecting baseline and candidate runs to compare. Should allow easy selection from recent runs, with the ability to filter by suite.
acceptance_criteria: Two run selector dropdowns (baseline and candidate)
Dropdowns show recent runs grouped by suite
Each option shows: suite name, version, score, date
Selected run shows summary card below dropdown
Compare button enabled when both runs selected
URL updates with selected run IDs for shareability
Pre-fill selectors from URL params if present
implementation_notes: Use Combobox or searchable Select component
Group options by suite name in dropdown
Consider recent runs vs all runs toggle
